trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> evento viene generato quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> o altro controllo server è stato spostato all'interno della relativa area o in un'altra zona.

trans-unit.source: This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move.
trans-unit.target: Ciò può verificarsi quando un utente trascina un controllo e quando si verifica uno spostamento a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete or to track the user action.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> evento viene generato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> (metodo) e offre l'opportunità per annullare il processo di spostamento prima del completamento o per tenere traccia dell'azione utente.

trans-unit.source: If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: Se lo spostamento viene completato e il controllo viene inserito in una nuova posizione, questo evento è seguito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs> class contains information about the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs> classe contiene informazioni sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> evento.

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being moved and the zone it is being moved to.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce accesso a di controlli Web part che sono stato spostato e il fuso orario in che è stato spostato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control being moved.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o altro controllo server di cui viene eseguito lo spostamento.

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> to which <c>webPart</c> is being moved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> di destinazione in cui viene spostato <c>webPart</c>.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of <c>webPart</c> relative to other controls within <c>zone</c>.
trans-unit.target: Intero che indica l'indice di <c>webPart</c> in relazione ad altri controlli all'interno di <c>zone</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Parts zone to which the Web Parts control is being moved.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la zona Web part in cui viene spostato il controllo Web part.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> to which the Web Parts control is being moved.
trans-unit.target: Zona <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> in cui viene spostato il controllo Web part.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index position of a Web Parts control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione di indice di un controllo Web part all'interno della relativa zona.

trans-unit.source: The numerical order of a control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: Ordine numerico di un controllo all'interno della zona di appartenenza.

trans-unit.source: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
trans-unit.target: Il primo controllo in una zona presenta un valore di indice pari a zero.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being moved in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> proprietà indica l'ordine numerico (o la posizione ordinale) all'interno della zona per il controllo di Web part spostato durante il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllo utilizza questa proprietà per tenere traccia e gestire l'insieme di controlli Web part in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> proprietà per un controllo non può essere uguale il valore di indice del controllo stesso all'interno di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> insieme.
